mapper.sql: SELECT u.user_id, u.username, u.email, u.mobile, u.password, u.status, u.create_time, u.gender, u.last_login_time, u.update_time, u.description, u.avatar, u.dept_id, d.dept_name, GROUP_CONCAT(r.role_id) roleIds, GROUP_CONCAT(r.role_name) roleName FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN t_user_role ur ON (u.user_id = ur.user_id) LEFT JOIN t_role r ON (r.role_id = ur.role_id) LEFT JOIN t_dept d ON (u.dept_id = d.dept_id) WHERE 1 = 1
